name: ms-language
description: Language support for the MS language (lexer-based highlighting, run via MS interpreter).

commands.title: MS: Download Interpreter
commands.description: Download the latest ms.exe from GitHub releases and set as runtime

ms.runtimePath.description: Absolute path to the compiled Rust interpreter executable for running .ms files

ms.autoDetectRuntime.description: Automatically detect the MS interpreter executable in common build locations and PATH

ms.searchPaths.description: Additional directories to search for the interpreter executable

ms.args.description: Extra command line arguments passed to the interpreter when running the current file

ms.runOnSave.description: Run the current MS file automatically when it is saved

ms.showProcessExit.description: Append the process exit code to the output channel

ms.enableSemanticTokens.description: Enable semantic token highlighting using the built-in lexer

ms.enableCompletions.description: Enable completions for built-ins and keywords

ms.enableHoverDocstrings.description: Enable hover tooltips with built-in docs and nearby docstrings/comments

ms.enableSignatureHelp.description: Enable signature help for built-in functions
